statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Anna%'
SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating = 5
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_name ASC, rating DESC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT AVG(rating), COUNT(*) FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(LENGTH(feedback_text)) AS avg_feedback_length FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM QRPayment GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount_paid > 500;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN QRPayment ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = QRPayment.customer_id WHERE QRPayment.amount > 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT qrcode_id, qrcode_validity FROM QRCodeGeneration WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_amount > 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 5;

SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_amount, ph.payment_date FROM PaymentHistory ph INNER JOIN CustomerFeedback cf ON ph.customer_id = cf.customer_id INNER JOIN QRCodeGeneration qg ON cf.customer_id = qg.customer_id WHERE ph.payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY ph.payment_date ASC;

SELECT qg.qrcode_id, cf.customer_id, qg.qrcode_validity FROM QRCodeGeneration qg LEFT JOIN CustomerFeedback cf ON qg.customer_id = cf.customer_id WHERE cf.feedback_id IS NULL ORDER BY qg.qrcode_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_status FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT t.payment_id, c.customer_name, p.payment_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.payment_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN qr_payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%great%';

SELECT t.transaction_date, c.customer_name, p.payment_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.payment_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN qr_payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT comments FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount < 100.50;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT QRCodeTransactions.transaction_id, QRCodeDetails.qr_code_value, CustomerDetails.customer_name FROM QRCodeTransactions INNER JOIN QRCodeDetails ON QRCodeTransactions.qr_code_id = QRCodeDetails.qr_code_id INNER JOIN CustomerDetails ON QRCodeTransactions.amount > 1000 AND CustomerDetails.customer_id = QRCodeTransactions.transaction_id;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(rating) AS lowest_rating FROM CustomerFeedback;
